channel.title: I cant Get On Moparscape (1st Time Download File)
channel.description:
Messages from moparscape
[07:56:41] Starting MoparScape 3.2 [07:56:41] Playing 0-hangar.mid [07:56:42] [07:56:42] News: Welcome to MoparScape 3.2, the pinnacle of RS2 [07:56:42] News: first generation client editing, with a built [07:56:42] News: in private server, music player capable of playing [07:56:42] News: both midis and mp3s, item/object/npc changer/viewer and [07:56:42] News: much much more. For updates, suggestions, or help [07:56:42] News: please visit the forums at www.moparisthebest.com/smf [07:56:42] News: and post in my thread. Y'all have fun. [07:56:42] News: [07:56:42] News: For online servers, look at the [07:56:42] News: server status list at moparisthebest.com [07:56:42] News: [07:56:42] News: -moparisthebest [07:56:42] Server : 127.0.0.1 [07:56:42] [07:56:42] [07:56:42] Loaded 0 random handlers [07:56:42] # Loading controllers Downloading the 16mb cache file just once, please be patient. Downloading c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/cache.zip...
Look A couple up Then its downloading the file then it shuts off. It worked on my OLD computer but it was so slow i couldnt even host my server. So i got this one and it wont work. Im using wireless

item.title: I cant Get On Moparscape (1st Time Download File)
item.dc:creator: @T_I_T_A_N T I T A N
item.description:
@T_I_T_A_N wrote:

WAAAITTTT so how do u adjust your windows firewall to run the servers properly?!?! cuz whenver i run Mopar Scape i can play for like 1 min then it says Connection Lost. And on my laptop when i run it on the webclient it just shuts off!?!?!in the middle of download

Read full topic
